ygData.subject: Whistler awakens
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I don t care if he shouldn t be repaired yet I didn t find him after two weeks only to have him laid up for another week in repairs. ... He slowly wakes

Subject: Whistler awakens

OOC: I don't care if he shouldn't be repaired yet I didn't find him after two 
weeks only to have him laid up for another week in repairs.

::Whistler::
    He slowly wakes up and steps out of the CR chamber expecting to see 
something.  In fact he saw nothing.  Well, that isn't exactly true he could 
see and did see trees and he saw bots picking through wreckage but he did not 
see the one thing he expected a base he should have been inside one.  He 
couldn't remember where he was.  He remembered the wreckage but thought he 
was delirious.  He got back into beast mode and sped off into the brush.
